overview: Here is a very rare and unknown documentary directed by Alain Resnais when he was still a student, part of his series about painters of his time. The film is only 6 minutes 20 seconds but it has an audio track, which is not the case with all the films of the series.Christine Boumeester was Henri Goetz 's wife and Resnais also directed a documentary about him.
title: Christine Boomeester
